cab.content: * o 234(This Docurn BritannicCirculated by the Secretary of State for India,SECRET.?rty ottienl) From Viceroy, Foreign Department, 28th March 1918. (Received 29th March at 10.30 a.m.) Secret. Weekly report. North-West Frontier. On 18th March DoctorVernon Starr (?), Church of England Missionary Society, murdered atPeshawar by unknown assailants. Incident has no political significance. Baluchistan. For Mari disturbance, see separate Army Departmenttelegram.
